summary:
The Security Council, recalling its previous resolutions on Libya, including the arms embargo imposed by resolution 1970 (2011), and resolutions concerning the implementation of the embargo off the coast of Libya, 

Decides to extend the authorizations set out in resolution 2473 for 12 months. 
Requests the Secretary-General to report on implementation within 11 months. 
Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
